name: deliverance
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the state of being saved from a painful or bad experience: We pray for deliverance from our sins. The families hoped for the safe deliverance of their husbands, fathers, and brothers. See
deliver
More examplesFewer examplesPeople in the country gained a complete deliverance from the power of an aristocracy which had always before oppressed them.Her deliverance came after a three-year legal battle by her parents to allow her to die with dignity.Penelope was promised deliverance from her suffering.
